entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
